document.full_text: charlie sheen plans to "riff like an artist" from memory rather than use a script on  his 21-date "torpedo of truth" tour next month, delivering a mostly spoken word performance of about 80 minutes, according to one of the show's producers.
document.title: no script. all riff. sheen tour details trickle out
